widget.name: Bramhodyog
widget.description: Shripad Deshmukh (deshmukhsc@gmail.com) Bramhodyog app is specially developed for Brahman business entrepreneurs to promote their business and to increase inter-community business.Using "Leads" facility you can post your requirements and a notification will be sent to business owners with respect to their category.You use "Leads" facility can be used to get business as well as to give business to other memebrs.
widget.author: Webmart Team
